Water Rates are as follows:
First 30,000 gal. per month—25c per 1,000 gal.
Next 80,000 gal. per month—20c per 1,000 gal.
Next 900,000 gal. per month—15c per 1,000 gal.
Next 1,000,000 gal. per month—10c per 1,000 gal.
All additional—4½c per 1000 gallons.
